project_descr: The project will demonstrate how within one landscape certain areas of abandoned degraded agricultural peatlands that emit carbon can be restored, while adjacent areas can be protected at the same time to increase carbon sequestration.

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to create a model for restoration of drained degraded peatlands that emit carbon, to produce cost-efficient positive effect both on climate change mitigation and adaptation, ecosystem’s health and local economy.
